oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pioneer Rhythm Boys - WHFB - 1949-03-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Pioneer Rhythm Boys radio show for station WHFB, Benton Harbor, MI. Originally broadcast Saturday March 12, 1949 at 11:30 am. Featuring Dwight Edmunds (announcer), Eddie Skates (host), and (verbally identified) band members Bud 'The Deacon' Wheeler, Ray 'The Professor' Watkins, Tiny and Earl (presumably Gulley). Sponsored by Bill's Auto Service and Super Save-Way Market.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Pioneer Rhythm Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Dwight Edmunds) -- Opening statement (Eddie Skates) -- There's No Room In My Heart For The Blues -- Bill's Auto Service commercial (Dwight Edmunds) -- Eddie Skates introduces the Professor -- Guitar Polka -- Eddie Skates introduces Tiny -- Milk Cow Blues -- Super Save-Way commercial (Dwight Edmunds) -- Eddie Skates talks -- Too Fat Polka -- Theme -- Closing statement (Eddie Skates) -- Closing statement (Dwight Edmunds)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WHFB (Radio station : Benton Harbor, Mich.); Pioneer Rhythm Boys
